attributes.action: Stop modified exhaust system cars and motorbikes on public road
attributes.additional_details: It is illegal, we deserve to live in peace
attributes.background: Stop modified exhaust system cars and motorbikes on public road. Those irresponsible drivers and riders who likes to show off and cause an extreme noise for residents which affecting everyones life especially kids and babies at night time and cause more pollution to everyone.

rejection.details:
It's already illegal to modify the exhaust system to make a vehicle noisier.

Decisions about investigating and prosecuting alleged crimes are a matter for the police and Crown Prosecution Service, not the Government or Parliament.

If you think that a crime has been committed, you should contact the police here: https://www.police.uk/contact/
